text: Brian Ezequiel Alferez (born 4 April 1998) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Godoy Cruz. ==Career== Alferez joined Godoy Cruz's youth system in 2012. Six years later, in January 2018, Alferez made his professional debut in a 1–0 Primera División win over Chacarita Juniors. On 14 June 2019, Alferez agreed a loan move to Primera B Nacional's Gimnasia y Esgrima for the 2019–20 campaign. He made fifteen appearances in total for Gimnasia, prior to returning to Godoy on 30 June 2020.
